full_summary:
### Aircraft Rental for CAAWC Parachutists

#### Notice Details
* **Notice Reference Number:**
  * CB-8632-25505553
* **Amendment Number:**
  * 1 (Revised on September 7, 2023)
* **Publication Date:**
  * August 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:**
  * September 7, 2023, at 13:00:00 (EST)
* **Contracting Entity:**
  * Combat Training Centre

#### Tender Information
* **Procurement Category:**
  * Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:**
  * Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:**
  * RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement
* **Trade Agreements:**
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:**
  * Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:**
  * Ontario (except National Capital Region)
  * National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Tender Description
The Combat Training Centre seeks proposals to provide aircraft rental services for Parachutists (Air Transport Services) for CAAWC as per Supply Arrangement W6399-18KA26 from September 10 to 23, 2023 in Trenton, Ontario. Request for Proposal has been sent to the holders of Supply Arrangement.

#### Contact Information
* **Name:** Tyler McEachern
* **Email:** Dave.Mceachern@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (506) 422-2000
* **Country:** Canada

#### Documents
For more information, please refer to the attached tender notice document at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8632/20230830_caawc_24096t_npp_1.pdf
